> Authentication - JFusion vBulletin Dual Login JFusion Development Team February 2009 JFusion Development Team webmaster@jfusion.org http://www.jfusion.org Copyright (C) 2009 JFusion. All rights reserved. http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-2.0.html GNU/GPL 1.1.2
This plugin allows for dual login from vBulletin to Joomla allowing a user to log into vBulletin and automatically be logged into Joomla A vBulletin plugin must be installed before this plugin will work. Install the vB plugin via JFusion's configuration page for vBulletin.
jfusionvbulletin.php
